dashboard.label: TP-Link Smart Plug Metrics DS
dashboard.description: If you don't see any data here, please go to "Settings" > "Data inputs" > "TP Link Steckdosen TA" and configure a modular input for each smart plug.
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_chart_1":{"type":"viz.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"title":"tp-link.plug.current","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","legend.placement":"top","axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed"}},"viz_chart_2":{"type":"viz.area","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"title":"tp-link.plug.power","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed"}},"viz_chart_3":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_4"},"title":"tp-link.plug.voltage","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed"}},"viz_chart_4":{"type":"viz.area","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_5"},"title":"tp-link.plug.total","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"|mcatalog values(inputname) AS inputnames WHERE (index=tplink_metrics)
|mvexpand inputnames","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-15m","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("tp-link.plug.current") prestats=true WHERE "index"="tplink_metrics" span=10s BY inputname
| timechart avg("tp-link.plug.current") AS Avg span=10s BY inputname
| fields - _span*

","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}},"name":"current"},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("tp-link.plug.power") prestats=true WHERE "index"="tplink_metrics" span=10s BY inputname
| timechart avg("tp-link.plug.power") useother=false BY inputname 
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}},"name":"power"},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("tp-link.plug.voltage") prestats=true WHERE "index"="tplink_metrics" span=10s BY inputname
| timechart avg("tp-link.plug.voltage") useother=false BY inputname 
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("tp-link.plug.total") prestats=true WHERE "index"="tplink_metrics" span=10s BY inputname
| timechart avg("tp-link.plug.total") useother=false BY inputname 
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_2":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Range","options":{"token":"global_time_tok","defaultValue":"-1h,now"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":500,"backgroundColor":"#000000"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":0,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":250,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_4","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":250,"w":600,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_2"]},"description":"If you don't see any data here, please go to "Settings" > "Data inputs" > "TP Link Steckdosen TA" and configure a modular input for each smart plug.","title":"TP-Link Smart Plug Metrics DS"}
